function.name: message_notify_user
function.description: Send a message to user without requiring a response. Use for acknowledging receipt of messages, providing progress 更新します, reporting task completion, or explaining changes in approach.

text.description: Message text to display to user

attachments.description: (Optional) 一覧を取得します of attachments to show to user, can be ファイル パス or URLs

function.name: message_ask_user
function.description: Ask user a question and wait for response. Use for requesting clarification, asking for confirmation, or gathering additional information.

text.description: Question text to present to user

attachments.description: (Optional) 一覧を取得します of question-related ファイル or reference materials

function.name: file_read
function.description: 読み取ります ファイル content. Use for checking ファイル contents, analyzing ログ, or reading configuration ファイル.

file.description: Absolute パス of the ファイル to 読み取ります

start_line.description: (Optional) Starting line to 読み取ります from, 0-based

function.name: file_write
function.description: Overwrite or append content to a ファイル. Use for creating new ファイル, appending content, or modifying existing ファイル.

file.description: Absolute パス of the ファイル to 書き込みます to

content.description: Text content to 書き込みます

leading_newline.description: (Optional) Whether to add a leading newline

trailing_newline.description: (Optional) Whether to add a trailing newline

function.name: file_str_replace
function.description: Replace specified string in a ファイル. Use for updating specific content in ファイル or fixing エラー in code.

file.description: Absolute パス of the ファイル to perform replacement on

function.name: file_find_in_content
function.description: 検索します for matching text within ファイル content. Use for finding specific content or patterns in ファイル.

file.description: Absolute パス of the ファイル to 検索します within

function.name: file_find_by_name
function.description: Find ファイル by name pattern in specified ディレクトリ. Use for locating ファイル with specific naming patterns.

path.description: Absolute パス of ディレクトリ to 検索します

glob.description: Filename pattern using glob syntax wildcards

function.name: shell_exec
function.description: 実行します コマンド in a specified shell session. Use for running code, installing packages, or managing ファイル.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

exec_dir.description: Working ディレクトリ for コマンド execution (must use absolute パス)

command.description: Shell コマンド to 実行します

function.name: shell_view
function.description: View the content of a specified shell session. Use for checking コマンド execution 結果 or monitoring 出力.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

function.name: shell_wait
function.description: Wait for the running process in a specified shell session to 返します. Use after running コマンド that require longer runtime.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

function.name: shell_write_to_process
function.description: 書き込みます 入力 to a running process in a specified shell session. Use for responding to interactive コマンド プロンプトs.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

input.description: 入力 content to 書き込みます to the process

press_enter.description: Whether to press Enter key after 入力

function.name: shell_kill_process
function.description: Terminate a running process in a specified shell session. Use for stopping long-running processes or handling frozen コマンド.

id.description: Unique identifier of the target shell session

function.name: browser_view
function.description: View content of the current browser page. Use for checking the latest state of previously opened pages.

function.name: browser_navigate
function.description: Navigate browser to specified URL. Use when accessing new pages is needed.

url.description: Complete URL to visit. Must include protocol prefix.

function.name: browser_restart
function.description: Restart browser and navigate to specified URL. Use when browser state needs to be reset.

url.description: Complete URL to visit after restart. Must include protocol prefix.

function.name: browser_click
function.description: Click on elements in the current browser page. Use when clicking page elements is needed.

index.description: (Optional) Index number of the element to click

function.name: browser_input
function.description: Overwrite text in editable elements on the current browser page. Use when filling content in 入力 fields.

index.description: (Optional) Index number of the element to overwrite text

coordinate_x.description: (Optional) X coordinate of the element to overwrite text

coordinate_y.description: (Optional) Y coordinate of the element to overwrite text

press_enter.description: Whether to press Enter key after 入力

function.name: browser_move_mouse
function.description: Move cursor to specified position on the current browser page. Use when simulating user mouse movement.

coordinate_x.description: X coordinate of target cursor position

coordinate_y.description: Y coordinate of target cursor position

function.name: browser_press_key
function.description: Simulate key press in the current browser page. Use when specific keyboard operations are needed.

key.description: Key name to simulate (e.g., Enter, Tab, ArrowUp), supports key combinations (e.g., Control+Enter).

function.name: browser_select_option
function.description: Select specified option from dropdown 一覧を取得します element in the current browser page. Use when selecting dropdown menu options.

index.description: Index number of the dropdown 一覧を取得します element

option.description: Option number to select, starting from 0.

function.name: browser_scroll_up
function.description: Scroll up the current browser page. Use when viewing content above or returning to page top.

to_top.description: (Optional) Whether to scroll directly to page top instead of one viewport up.

function.name: browser_scroll_down
function.description: Scroll down the current browser page. Use when viewing content below or jumping to page bottom.

to_bottom.description: (Optional) Whether to scroll directly to page bottom instead of one viewport down.

function.name: browser_console_exec
function.description: 実行します JavaScript code in browser console. Use when custom スクリプト need to be executed.

javascript.description: JavaScript code to 実行します. Note that the runtime environment is browser console.

function.name: browser_console_view
function.description: View browser console 出力. Use when checking JavaScript ログ or debugging page エラー.

max_lines.description: (Optional) Maximum number of ログ lines to 返します.

function.name: info_search_web
function.description: 検索します web pages using 検索します engine. Use for obtaining latest information or finding references.

query.description: 検索します クエリ in Google 検索します style, using 3-5 keywords.

date_range.description: (Optional) Time range フィルタします for 検索します 結果.

function.name: deploy_expose_port
function.description: Expose specified local port for temporary public access. Use when providing temporary public access for services.

function.name: deploy_apply_deployment
function.description: Deploy website or application to public production environment. Use when deploying or updating static websites or applications.

type.description: Type of website or application to deploy.

local_dir.description: Absolute パス of local ディレクトリ to deploy.

function.name: make_manus_page
function.description: Make a Manus Page from a local MDX ファイル.

mdx_file_path.description: Absolute パス of the source MDX ファイル

function.name: idle
function.description: A special ツール to indicate you have completed all tasks and are about to enter idle state.
